about.paragraph1: MaaEnd is more than a simple script. Built on MaaFrameworkâ€™s â€œblack-box automationâ€ capabilities, it forms a closed loop of screenshot capture â†’ visual recognition â†’ branching decisions â†’ action execution. Without reading any in-game/internal data, it hands repetitive tasks over to the program.
about.paragraph2: Whether youâ€™re on PC or Android/emulators, MaaEnd runs tasks with the same logic to minimize platform-specific hassle. With auto-updates and continuous iteration, you can spend your time in the gameâ€”not in configuration.
